SEARCH
Package ComparativeGenomics.FileHandling.DataHandling

Class CmapData

java.lang.Object
ComparativeGenomics.FileHandling.DataHandling.CmapData
public class CmapData extends Object
Stores the data corresponding to each cmap ID within a CMAP file.
Author:
franpeters

  • Method Details

    • addSite

      public void addSite(Integer id, Site site)
      Add a Site object to a LinkedHashMap where the key is the site ID and the value is a Site object.
      Parameters:
      id - site id
      site - Site object, containing further information about the site
